categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Blue Nine was a pilot in the Rebel Alliance's Blue Squadron. During the ambush on Ral's Run, Blue Nine's T-65 X-wing starfighter was targeted by TIE/IN interceptors which were driven off by other pilots.
Blue Nine appears in the opening story for Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game sourcebook Stay on Target.
